## Notification for Advance Contract Award Notice
### Solicitation Number
WS3865393769

### Title
Mycotoxin Analysis Instrument

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is announcing an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of a Mycotoxin Analysis Instrument. The instrument will be used for the in-house analysis of cereal samples for deoxynivalenol detection at the Swift Current Research and Development Centre.

### Requirements
This purchasing decision will enhance the ability to conduct high-throughput deoxynivalenol analysis for future projects and reduce overall costs by allowing for in-house analysis.
